screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .tscdf file in TechSmith Camtasia 2023
screenshot.caption: TSCDF file open in TechSmith Camtasia 2023

description: Camtasia is an application for Windows and macOS that captures screen activity, such as a video conference, how-to tutorial, software demonstration, or online gaming session. The application includes several default device frames, and you can also download more from the TechSmith library site.

You can access the device frames in Camtasia by selecting "Visual Effects" in the pane on the left side of the program interface, then drag and drop the "Device Frame" effect onto your video. Camtasia then frames the clip in that device.

You can change the device frame type by selecting the "Device Frame Type" dropdown menu in the right pane of the program interface. You can also select Download More... from the dropdown menu to download different device frames or select Remove Device Frames... to choose device frames to remove from the list.
NOTE: TSCDF stands for "TechSmith Camtasia Device Frame."
